%function(self) self:shadowlength(1) self:settext('W A R N I N G') self:diffuse(1,0.5,0.5,1) end

Layer.SongCheckCommand: %function(self) local Profile = PROFILEMAN:GetMachineProfile():GetSaved() if table.getn( SONGMAN:GetAllSongs() ) - Profile.DWISongs == 1 then self:settext( table.getn( SONGMAN:GetAllSongs() ) - Profile.DWISongs ..' New song found.') else self:settext( table.getn( SONGMAN:GetAllSongs() ) - Profile.DWISongs ..' New songs found.') end self:diffuse(1,1,0,1) self:shadowlength(1) end

Layer.UpdateSongAmmountCommand: %function(self) local Profile = PROFILEMAN:GetMachineProfile():GetSaved() Profile.DWISongs = table.getn( SONGMAN:GetAllSongs() ) PROFILEMAN:SaveMachineProfile() end
